Title: Relates to medical treatment for certain workers' compensation claimants
Summary: Provides that where an employer or insurance carrier elects to controvert the right to compensation and such claimant holds a valid insurance policy, the employer or insurance carrier shall provide medical treatment to the injured claimant and payment to health care providers without regard to such controversy.
LawCode: Amd ยง25, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to medical treatment for workers' compensation claimants when the workers' compensation claim has been controverted
